Key Match Events: New Zealand won the match by seven wickets
Papua New Guinea scored 78 all out in 19.4 overs
New Zealand chase down the target in 12.2 overs
Lockie Ferguson was the player of the match
Pre-Game Insights: New Zealand captain Kane Williamson mentioned the challenges of the pitch and the team's adaptability
Both teams were already eliminated from Super 8s contention
Post-Match Reflections: Kane Williamson expressed pride in the team's performance
Papua New Guinea captain Assad Vala talked about learning from the match and future improvements
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was significant for some players as their last game in the format
New Zealand finished third in Group C with two points short of West Indies
